name: Gulrez
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May Allah bless us all with success, health, happiness, patience and strength. May all your dreams come true and may you live the life that you have always dreamed of. May Allah bless you with victory in this life and eternal life too. Amen!! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: when are you having the party ?.
